title: [A1][M0] Init repo & uv project
body:
- Create pyproject.toml (uv) and uv.lock
- Ensure .venv is gitignored
- Acceptance: `uv sync` works locally

title: [A2][M0] Pre-commit & style (ruff/black/mypy)
body:
- Configure pre-commit with ruff, black, mypy(strict)
- Acceptance: `pre-commit run -a` passes

title: [A3][M0] Makefile & task aliases
body:
- up/down/logs/init-db/ingest/score/backtest targets
- Acceptance: `make up` starts stack

title: [A4][M5] CI skeleton (GitHub Actions)
body:
- Lint, typecheck, tests matrix on PR
- Acceptance: green CI on a dummy PR

title: [B1][M0] Docker Compose stack
body:
- Services: Postgres+Timescale+pgvector, MinIO, FastAPI, Prefect, Grafana, Prometheus, Loki
- Healthchecks for each service

title: [B2][M0] DB bootstrap (schema.sql + extensions)
body:
- Create tables & indexes; enable extensions
- Acceptance: hypertables exist for signal & price_bar

title: [B3][M5] Alembic migrations
body:
- Hand-written migrations (no autogenerate)
- Acceptance: `alembic upgrade head` works from empty DB

title: [C1][M0] Pydantic schemas (DTOs)
body: - Article, TickerLink, Signal request/response models

title: [C2][M0] SQL models & repositories
body: - SQLAlchemy models; typed query helpers

title: [C3][M0] Config system (pydantic-settings + YAML)
body:
- configs/sources.yaml and configs/scoring.yaml
- Acceptance: pipelines read from config

title: [C4][M0] Seed ticker universe (NASDAQ/NYSE)
body: - Load CSV → ticker(symbol,name,aliases)

title: [D1][M1] Collector base library
body:
- Interface: fetch(since) -> Iterable[Item]
- Rate-limit/backoff; idempotent write to MinIO raw/

title: [D2][M1] GDELT collector
body:
- Pull last hour; map to Item; capture source_url/license/retrieved_at
- Acceptance: ≥100 items land in raw/

title: [D3][M1] Raw→DB loader
body: - Upsert Article; dedupe by url + title SimHash

title: [D4][M5] SEC RSS collector (8-K/10-Q/10-K)
body: - OAuth not required; parse feed; map to Item

title: [D5][M5] Stocktwits collector (cashtags)
body: - OAuth token; filter posts with cashtags; store rate-limit meta

title: [E1][M1] Normalizer
body:
- Lang detect (keep EN), strip boilerplate, canonicalize URLs
- Write clean_events/

title: [E2][M1] Ticker linker
body:
- Cashtags + symbol dict + synonyms; NER fallback; confidence scoring
- Acceptance: ≥90% precision on 100 labeled items

title: [F1][M2] Sentiment (FinBERT)
body: - Prob pos/neg/neu; store per-article sentiment score

title: [F2][M2] Embeddings (MiniLM)
body: - 384-dim for title+lead; store in article_embed

title: [F3][M2] Novelty metric
body: - novelty = 1 - max cosine sim vs last 24h per-ticker

title: [F4][M2] Velocity metric
body: - Mention counts per ticker; z-score vs rolling 30d

title: [G1][M2] Signal scoring engine
body:
- score = w1*sent + w2*novelty + w3*velocity + tag_boost
- Store top-2 contributing articles per signal

title: [G2][M5] Tag rules (earnings/guidance/M&A)
body: - Keyword rules + SEC doc types mapping

title: [H1][M3] Price adapter (Alpha Vantage, EOD)
body: - Ingest daily bars into price_bar

title: [H2][M3] Returns join & leak checks
body: - Align to market open/close; no look-ahead

title: [H3][M3] Backtest metrics
body: - IC (Spearman), top-decile return, hit-rate; JSON artifact

title: [H4][M3] Backtest CLI & PNG charts
body: - CLI entrypoint; save artifacts/plots
